pages.title: Ender Cell
pages.text: An Ender Cell provides energy (FE) storage and transfer without cables and across dimensions using the Ender Network. $(p)There are 7 tiers of Ender Cells with increasing max I/O rates and access to more channels on the Ender Network.

pages.title: Ender Network
pages.text: The Ender Network has 12 channels to store and transfer energy. Channels can't store or transfer energy until you add capacity to them with an $(l:store_and_transfer/energy_cell)Energy Cell$(/l) or a $(l:store_and_transfer/battery)Battery$(/l). You add capacity to a channel by right-clicking an Ender Cell and shift-clicking an Energy Cell or Battery in your inventory. The capacity of the Energy Cell or a Battery will be permanently added to the selected channel, any energy in the item will be added to the channel, and the item will be consumed.
